title: Deputy Sales Manager – Logistics Industry
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH AIR TIGER EXPRESS LOGISTICS VIỆT NAM
job_description:
• Work closely with cross-functional teams, including market analysis, pricing, and operations, to align sales efforts with company goals and ensure seamless service delivery.
• Based on the available company resources, coordinate with Sales Manager to develop and implement effective sales strategies to drive business growth.
• Propose and discuss enhancements to processes, policies, and campaigns aimed at improving the team's efficiency.
• Assist in managing and leading the sales team to meet and exceed revenue targets.
• Maintain and strengthen relationships with existing customers to ensure long-term business growth.
• Identify new business opportunities, build strong relationships with key clients, and expand the customer base.
• Support the sales team with guidance, training, and motivation to maximize their performance.
• Recruit, train, and onboard new sales team members as needed.
• Ensure the sales team maintains high levels of customer satisfaction and delivers exceptional service.
• Prepare and present sales reports, forecasts, and performance analysis to management.
requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in International Business, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
• Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales within the Ocean Carriers or Freight forwarding industry.
• Having 1 year or more of experience as a team leader/sales supervisor is a plus
• Have good relationship with Carriers is a plus.
• Strong leadership, coaching, and team management skills.
• Excellent communication, negotiation, conflict resolution, problem solving & time management skills.
• Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite.
• Ability to thrive in a target-driven environment.
• Good command of English.
